hasDitaContent.@value: Tirofiban causes bleeding, as can cilostazol ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tirofiban   causes   bleeding, as can   cilostazol   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both cilostazol and tolfenamic acid can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  cilostazol  and  tolfenamic acid  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Cilostazol causes bleeding, as can trametinib ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Cilostazol   causes   bleeding, as can   trametinib   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Cilostazol causes bleeding, as can trastuzumab emtansine ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Cilostazol   causes   bleeding, as can   trastuzumab emtansine   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both cilostazol and treprostinil can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  cilostazol  and  treprostinil  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Urokinase causes bleeding, as can cilostazol ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Urokinase   causes   bleeding, as can   cilostazol   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both cilostazol and venlafaxine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  cilostazol  and  venlafaxine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Cilostazol causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Cilostazol   causes   bleeding, as can   volanesorsen   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to moderately increase the exposure to cilostazol. Manufacturer advises adjust cilostazol dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   moderately   increase   the exposure to   cilostazol .  Manufacturer advises adjust  cilostazol  dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both cilostazol and vortioxetine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  cilostazol  and  vortioxetine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Warfarin causes bleeding, as can cilostazol ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.
